user.description: Please specifiy the adress of your Resol device:

data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of your Resol KM2 or DL2/DL2Plus/DL3 device or your json-live-data-server (KM1, VBus/LAN or VBus/USB). If json-live-data-server runs as Add-on use '127.0.0.1'.
data_description.port: Port of your Resol KM2 or DL2/DL2Plus/DL3. Defaults to '80'. If you use json-live-data-server (KM1, VBus/LAN or VBus/USB), the default port is '3333'.

auth.description: Your Resol device requires credentials for authentication:

data_description.username: Username used for logging in to your device. Default is 'admin'.
data_description.password: Password used for logging in to your device.

data_description.scan_interval: Defines update frequency. Optional and in seconds. Defaults to '300' (5 min), minimum value is '60' (1 min).

dl23options.description: Configuration of your Resol DL2/DL3 device:

data_description.scan_interval: Defines update frequency. Optional and in seconds. Defaults to '300' (5 min), minimum value is '60' (1 min).
data_description.api_key: Applies the filter defined on the DL2/DL3. Use the ID of the filter defined on the Resol DL2/DL3 here.
